price: Nesse dia os humanos camparecerão, separadamente, para os fazerem ver suas obras.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yaṣduru al-nāsu ashtātan liyuraw aʿmālahum
